description:
Tomonari Kasumi is the owner of powerful character in an online game The World named Sieg. His class in the game is a blademaster. Tomonari is a boyfriend of http://anidb.net/ch9967 [Mai Minase]. Moreover, he is one of the coma victims.

He conveys his feelings towards Mai shortly before the incident. As he asked her out, he wanted to show her The World since Mai never played the game before and teach her how to play it properly. After creating her a character and inviting her to the game, they are attacked by a strange PC. This results into them falling to coma. Unlike Tomonari, Mai awakes shortly after in a hospital. To help her boyfriend, Mai agrees to help to http://anidb.net/ch60064 [Junichiro Tokuoka] who investigates the cases of players falling to coma due to mistakes in The World.
name: Tomonari Kasumi
